column2: we order appetizers onion rings and fried pickles tempura stile and crab dip
column3: the onion rings and pickle was really greasy
column4: the crab was more like a soup
column6: for main course my husband order the chicken pot pie and I order the cheesy grits and the fried chicken
column8: my grits were cold and salty
column10: I informed the waitress about the under cook chicken and she informed me that it wasn't under cooked and that it was the brine the chef used to marinate the chicken on
column11: so I showed her the bloody inside of my chicken and told her that it had nothing to do with the brine.
